record.description: Bernard E. Sunny, recently appointed honorary co-chairman of the University of Chicago Citizens Board. Mr. Sunny was the former chairman of the board of the Illinois Bell Telephone Company. He is the donor of the university's Sunny Gymnasium and served as chairman of the university's Citizen's Committee formed in 1926.
